content: this adorable crocheted mini birthday party hat is quick to make and perfect for any celebration with an aran/worsted weight yarn they are approximately 5 tall from the top of the pom pom to the bottom of the ruffles you will also find a full video tutorial on my youtube 1 channel 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=p3e6vutiiug&t=1382s the mini birthday party hat is a great stash buster and can be made in any color combination you would like i hope you enjoy this fun pattern and if you end up making it please tag me on instagram @lepetitsaintcrochet happy stitching
